Uses of Interface
com.espertech.esper.epl.agg.AggregationMethod

Packages that use AggregationMethod
com.espertech.esper.client.hook Callback interfaces for use with statement annotations. 
com.espertech.esper.epl.agg Contains aggregation service and aggregators 
com.espertech.esper.epl.core Contains EPL statement specification classes define the constructs that make up an EPL statement, such as the list of items in the select clause, the insert-into stream name and property names etc. 
com.espertech.esper.epl.enummethod.eval Enumeration method implementations. 
com.espertech.esper.epl.expression This package contains the EPL expression nodes that represent all expressions such as used in select clauses, group-by and having clauses, or order-by clauses
